extendedInfo.description: The Aircel Chennai Open is India and South Asia's only ATP World Tour event. Now in its 18th year, this tennis tournament will be held at the SDAT Nungambakkam Tennis Stadium from December 31, 2012 to January 6, 2013.For the first time in the event's history, with the new Aircel Chennai Open mobile app, fans will be able to see live matches, draws and results, players lists, and the latest tournament news wherever they are.Join in the action and enjoy the tournament on the go with your android mobiles!
